poem:
### Green Missteps

Engines grounded in flightless night,  
while steel veins pause, half-bright.  
Heathrow echoes a boundless roar,  
yet the tracks lie still, no hum, no score.  
Promises whispered in carbon dreams,  
missed connections on future's seams.  
In the shadow of ascent, descent spurned,  
thoughts of green left restless, unturned.
